meanings.sent1: The unwaxed apple looked dull compared to the shiny waxed ones.
meanings.sent2: I prefer unwaxed dental floss as it doesn't leave a residue.
meanings.sent3: The unwaxed floor was so slippery that even the cat couldn't keep its balance!
meanings.sent4: Her unwaxed car was like a blank canvas waiting for a splash of color.
meanings.sent5: The unwaxed candle burned quickly and brightly, without any added chemicals.

meanings.sent1: The unwaxed paper absorbed the ink quickly, creating a smudged effect.
meanings.sent2: I bought unwaxed thread for my sewing project to avoid any sticky residue.
meanings.sent3: The unwaxed surfboard was so slippery that the surfer couldn't stay on for long!
meanings.sent4: Her unwaxed hair shone in the sunlight like a golden halo.
meanings.sent5: The unwaxed skis glided effortlessly over the snow, like a bird in flight.
